'use strict';

// MODULES //

var ternaryFactory = require( '@stdlib/random/array/tools/ternary-factory' );
var dtypes = require( '@stdlib/array/dtypes' );
var defaults = require( '@stdlib/array/defaults' );
var base = require( '@{{BASE_PKG}}' );


// VARIABLES //

var DTYPES = dtypes( '{{OUTPUT_DTYPE_KIND}}' );


// MAIN //

/**
* Returns a function for creating arrays containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from {{FROM_DESC}}.
*
* @name factory
* @type {Function}
* @param {{{PARAM_1_JSDOC_DTYPE}}} [{{PARAM_1}}] - {{PARAM_1_DESC}}
* @param {{{PARAM_2_JSDOC_DTYPE}}} [{{PARAM_2}}] - {{PARAM_2_DESC}}
* @param {{{PARAM_3_JSDOC_DTYPE}}} [{{PARAM_3}}] - {{PARAM_3_DESC}}
* @param {Options} [options] - function options
* @param {PRNG} [options.prng] - pseudorandom number generator which generates uniformly distributed pseudorandom numbers
* @param {PRNGSeedMT19937} [options.seed] - pseudorandom number generator seed
* @param {PRNGStateMT19937} [options.state] - pseudorandom number generator state
* @param {boolean} [options.copy=true] - boolean indicating whether to copy a provided pseudorandom number generator state
* @param {string} [options.dtype="{{DEFAULT_DTYPE}}"] - default data type
* @throws {TypeError} `{{PARAM_1}}` {{PARAM_1_THROWS_DESC}}
* @throws {TypeError} `{{PARAM_2}}` {{PARAM_2_THROWS_DESC}}
* @throws {TypeError} `{{PARAM_3}}` {{PARAM_3_THROWS_DESC}}
* @throws {TypeError} options argument must be an object
* @throws {TypeError} must provide valid options
* @throws {Error} must provide a valid state
* @returns {Function} function for creating arrays
*
* @example
* var {{ALIAS}} = factory( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}}, {{PARAM_2_VALUE}}, {{PARAM_3_VALUE}} );
* // returns <Function>
*
* var arr = {{ALIAS}}( 10 );
* // returns <Float64Array>
*
* @example
* var {{ALIAS}} = factory( {{PARAM_1_VALUE}}, {{PARAM_2_VALUE}}, {{PARAM_3_VALUE}} );
* // returns <Function>
*
* var arr = {{ALIAS}}( 10, {
*     'dtype': 'generic'
* });
* // returns [...]
*/
var factory = ternaryFactory( base, DTYPES, defaults.get( 'dtypes.{{DEFAULT_DTYPE_KIND}}' ) );


// EXPORTS //

module.exports = factory;
